Items.Name: Slighty Magic Shelf
Items.Description: Found in the chambers of a not-so-talented wizard.

Items.Name: Daedric Shelf
Items.Description: Originally built for storing limbs and skulls. Perfect for your household collection of limbs and skulls.

Items.Name: Kallax Ultimate
Items.Description: It will never give you up. Never gonna let you down. Never gonna break down and desert you.

Items.Name: Shovel of the Ming Dynasty
Items.Description: Passed down for generation after generation. Made in China.

Items.Name: Imperial Shovel of Solitude
Items.Description: 'I used to be an adventurer, just like you. But then I took this shovel to the knee. Whoever wields this shovel, may rule over the lands of Skyrim.', Jarl Skelgrum

Items.Name: Mysterious golden Crown of Gender Bending
Items.Description: Cursed. Can only be unequipped with 'Break Curse'. Changes gender of the wielder to Apache Helicopter.
